name: Site Name
description: Template for creating site-specific extraction configs

start.comment: Type can be 'text' or 'coordinate'. For text, provide the string to find. For coordinate, provide {"x": 0, "y": 0}

end.comment: Marks the end of the extraction region

selectors.comment: OPTIONAL performance hints for DOM extraction. Set to null to use auto-detection (recommended). Auto-detection finds contact containers universally across sites.

scrollBehavior.comment: Controls page scrolling to load lazy content

parsing.comment: emailDomain filters emails to specific domain. nameBeforeEmail=true looks for name above email (used in text fallback). profileUrlPatterns are URL fragments that indicate profile pages.
